H0.text: Photosynthesis is the process by which plant-like protists containing chloroplasts make food.

H1.text: Digestion is the process by which plant‑like protists that contain chloroplasts make food.

H2.text: Chemical processes are how plant‑like protists that contain chloroplasts make food.

H3.text: Farming is the process by which plant‑like protists that contain chloroplasts make food.

A4.text: Photosynthesis takes place in organelles called chloroplasts.

A5.text: Embedded within the stroma are stacks of thylakoids (grana), which are the site of photosynthesis.
